text: The reason Trump won't answer any questions about why he accepted Xi Jinping's misrepresentations on COVID-19 in January despite EVERYONE telling him he was being lied to is because, friends, that's the whole ballgame: Trump AGAIN ignored US intelligence in favor of an autocrat.
